document_data.caption: A [[gold dwarf]] deep defender.
document_data.name: Great Rift Deep Defender
document_data.mainbody: '''Great Rift deep defenders''' were a force of [[gold dwarf|gold dwarves]] who defended the [[Great Rift]] from the enemies of their kin throughout the [[Underdark]]. They were stalwart defenders, and served as the main line of defense along the border of the [[Deep Realm]], the area underneath the Great Rift that connected it to the Underdark.
document_data.Abilities: These elite dwarven fighters excelled at fighting in the tight, narrow corridors of the Underdark. Once they held ground in a narrow passageway, they were nearly unmovable.
